name: UNI
description:
◎ UNI is a two-player game that consists of 30 kinds of mini games.
There's a 'Basketball', 'Dart', 'Gun Fight', 'Coin Stack' which you can play with just one button.
And also includes games such as "Table Soccer," "Block Breaker" and "Dodge this", "Alpha Battle" and "Fencing in Wonderland" which you can play with stick and buttons.
But all of the games have simple rules and simple to play, so anybody can play this game.◎ Feature of UNI
  • 30 mini games of various genres
  • Simple rules for all ages
  • Cute game graphics and fancy screen effects and sound effects
  • You can play with one keyboard or two game controllers
  • New free mini games will be added through update!
Play with one keyboard or two game controllers (recommended controller for Xbox)
We recommend you playing with two game controllers, but you can play with only one keyboard.
Player 1
Q,W,E
A,S,D
Z,X,C
on the nine keyboards of
Player 2 is the number of keys on the numeric keyboard.
7,8,9
4,5,6
1,2,3
You can enjoy the game with 9 keys on .
